title: Taisuke Hiramoto
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Hiramoto was born in <a href="Tokyo">Tokyo</a> on November 21, 1974. After graduating from <a href="Horikoshi%20High%20School">Horikoshi High School</a>, he played for <a href="Omiya%20Ardija">Omiya Ardija</a>. The club was promoted to the new <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> in 1999. He played many matches as forward and retired at the end of the 1999 season.
